EDMA3 Resource Manager

Modules

 EDMA3 Resource Manager Symbols
 EDMA3 Resource Manager Data Structures

Detailed Description

Introduction

Overview

EDMA3 Resource Manager is a TI mandated library for all EDMA3 peripheral users to acquire and configure EDMA3 hardware resources (DMA/QDMA channels, PaRAM Sets, TCCs etc.) and DMA Interrupt Service Routines.
